entities.description: The time frame of the past 30 days, including today's date.
The raw count of responses collected before weighting.
The percentage representation of the raw response counts.
The average score of the responses.
The median value of the responses.
The mode value of the responses.
The minimum score value of the responses.
The maximum score value of the responses.
The standard deviation of the response scores.
The number of valid (non-missing) response cases.
The total number of cases, including missing data.

relationships.description: Links survey data entries to their unweighted frequency counts.
Links survey data entries to their respective percentage representations.
Links the survey summary to the calculated mean score of the responses.
Links the survey summary to the calculated median score of the responses.
Links the survey summary to the calculated mode score of the responses.
Links the survey summary to the observed minimum score of the responses.
Links the survey summary to the observed maximum score of the responses.
Links the survey summary to the calculated standard deviation of the responses.
Links the survey results summary to the number of valid response cases.
Links the survey results summary to the total number of cases, including those with missing data.
